!cc begin
quasi-bot BOT 11/12/2022 8:18 PM
This event will involve a lot of bot commands and exploration. Use bot commands to explore your surroundings, and find small quests for rewards. You can explore an area, look at objects, or interact with objects using the command for the area. ex: <pf> is the command for the petrified forest area, and if you wish to look at a gnarled tree, you'd type <!pf gnarled tree> to do so. Actions to take or things to look at will most often required one-three words, and will never require more than four words. If you discover a quest, do a short rp relating to that quest. You are free to rp ANY of the involved npcs to facilitate this.

~==============oOo==============~ The merchants from the caravan have set up camp near the oasis. Their sledges, still packed with goods, sit near the turtles, who are taking a much deserved rest, and colorful tents have been erected all around. Damien BOT 11/15/2022 3:44 AM
Damien could feel the cold of the night creep up his skin. He preferred this over the hot of the day, but there was still a lot to look out for. Damien had been standing guard over the caravans while people slept. This was just where he felt most natural doing; guarding everyone. Part of him missed that aspect of Raehn. At least when he was guarding there, there was more to see. Now, all he sees is sand, it almost felt trippy. So he fashions himself a book to keep him company, ears carefully listening to the sound of the night. Some company would be nice right now.

Albert BOT 11/15/2022 4:06 AM
This whole trip so far had been... Strange, at best. He had kept close to Maza as to not faint from the unforgiving scorcing sun when they arrived, but as soon as the sun set, it all reversed and became unbearably cold instead. He is thankful for his Selkie Cloak as he's not sure how he would ever dress for the occasion in this contradictory weather in the dessert, especially as they prepared to land in town. Taking a little walk around camp to part calm his nerves, and part try to get some warmth back into his limbs, he catches the sight of someone in the outskirts. Smiling as it doesn't take a lot to guess who it is, Albert heads on over to pay him a little visit. He's not trying to be quiet as he walks on over to him, but the sand certainly dampens his steps quite a bit. Worried to frighten the other if he were to just suddenly appear out of thin air, he speaks softly and gently to catch Damiens attention as he reaches him. "Hello, Damien..! Are... Are you unable to fall asleep out here..?" It's softly spoken, but also gentle and full of concern for the other. Of course he is-- he wants Damien to be okay..! @haram unleashed
Damien BOT 11/15/2022 4:14 AM
Maybe it wasn’t just his hearing was so good, but it was because Albert was just doing a terrible job at being quiet. Damien could sniff the rabbit a mile away but he waited until the rabbit approached him before he turned. Damien smiles to Albert’s concern. It’s pretty hot out here… And there’s not much nature around..” he looks at the surroundings, noting the trees and plants.. Or lack of it. “Will you be alright here? Your magic relies on nature, right?”

-Each player uses a set of five dice. -The goal of the game is to roll the strongest hand in two out of three hands. First: roll the dice. Second: choose any dice you want to return. Ranking of Hands from Lowest to Highest: -Pair — two dice showing the same value. -Two Pairs — two pairs of dice, each showing the same value. -Three-of-a-Kind — three dice showing the same value. -Five High Straight — dice showing values from 1 through 5, inclusive. -Fakian's Blessing — five mismatched dice forming no sequence longer than four. -Six High Straight — dice showing values from 2 through 6, inclusive. -Full House — Pair of one value and Three-of-a-Kind of another. -Four-of-a-Kind — four dice showing the same value. -Five-of-a-Kind — all five dice showing the same value.

quasi-bot BOT 11/16/2022 7:41 AM
-Each player uses a set of five dice. -The goal of the game is to roll the strongest hand in two out of three hands. First: roll the dice. Second: choose any dice you want to return. Ranking of Hands from Lowest to Highest: -Pair — two dice showing the same value. -Two Pairs — two pairs of dice, each showing the same value. -Three-of-a-Kind — three dice showing the same value. -Five High Straight — dice showing values from 1 through 5, inclusive. -Fakian's Blessing — five mismatched dice forming no sequence longer than four. -Six High Straight — dice showing values from 2 through 6, inclusive. -Full House — Pair of one value and Three-of-a-Kind of another. -Four-of-a-Kind — four dice showing the same value. -Five-of-a-Kind — all five dice showing the same value.

-Each player uses a set of five dice. -The goal of the game is to roll the strongest hand in two out of three hands. First: roll the dice. Second: choose any dice you want to return. Ranking of Hands from Lowest to Highest: -Pair — two dice showing the same value. -Two Pairs — two pairs of dice, each showing the same value. -Three-of-a-Kind — three dice showing the same value. -Five High Straight — dice showing values from 1 through 5, inclusive. -Fakian's Blessing — five mismatched dice forming no sequence longer than four. -Six High Straight — dice showing values from 2 through 6, inclusive. -Full House — Pair of one value and Three-of-a-Kind of another. -Four-of-a-Kind — four dice showing the same value. -Five-of-a-Kind — all five dice showing the same value.

Planning to simply rest then continue on his way when the sun arose….but alas….when the knight awoke?…he would find himself to be trapped within the city limits. What did she do…when she found out? Or did she anticipate this reaction all along? Rue would wait til the children calmed and the teacher rallied their attention elsewhere before quietly asking Lucius, “Does…y-your story, h-happen to be from an experience?”

Lucius BOT 12/19/2022 6:27 PM
If the attention was daunting for someone who prefers to hide behind walls, and duck out of sight in the shadows, Lucius doesn't show it. He delivers the story with calm and precise pronunciation, stopping where appropriate for people to follow along. He knows the other two are listening, so a little out of spite feels he should at least make it sound professional. The story is one twisted of his own making. Nothing is a happy fairytale ending after all. You may wish for it, but not everyone gets one. There's a tired gaze he directs towards Rue, but a sly expression that dances upon his lips. "I don't typically like giving out the ending." He says. That was up to her imagination. Lucius wouldn't deny or confirm it. "That's for you to decide."

Rue BOT 12/20/2022 3:31 AM
So it was an open ended story A glimmer of a smile would threaten her lips. She deserved that comeback after denying Lucius and her Aunt clarification on …not one…but TWO stories this evening. Though this feroxi was certainly up to debate it. “W-with due time…I sh-shall.” She nods. The once setting sun now vanished completely beneath the sea of sand. “We-we’ve done quite a lot f-for one evening.”
Lucius BOT 12/20/2022 6:29 PM
He isn't one who likes to keep the story going, yet never one for the true end. Such a depressing story serves no purpose except to drag down those with a more lighthearted nature. Although he could certainly listen to Rue's theories, Lucius prefers to leave this one blank. Interpret it how she likes. As she brings up the idea of calling it for the day where sun no longer peeked its head out, he draws his eyes to the starry blanket above them. A sigh escapes his lips before he nods towards the two. "I shall retire for the night." He's seen enough after all, and he feels as though he might have wasted a little more time than he had liked. Lucius should best hurry back to his tent so he could read over some of the heavier tomes he had brought with him overnight. "Rest is imperative for another day of work." And heavy shoes unfitting for a person of his stature start to walk out a little further always, footprints following his steps as he heads for a quiet place to stay.
